isis.stitle: TSI 03-12-08 - Intake Air Piping Oil Residue

configure.engfam: I-6 Engines equipped simultaneously with both a Diamond Logic™ Engine Brake and an EVRT® Electronically Controlled Turbocharger beginning with engine serial number 1319430.

geninfo.para: It is normal for oil residue to be present in the intake air pipes on engines that are equipped simultaneously with both an Diamond Logic™ Engine Brake and an EVRT® Electronically Controlled Turbocharger.
This oil residue is a result of the exhaust back pressure produced when the exhaust brake is applied. This oil residue is normal and no service of the turbocharger or the engine is required.
